name: ChildCare Services
description: To meet the needs of student parents, the program is open year-round from 7:30 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday, and offer full and part-time childcare schedules. There are four programs throughout the year to match the University’s four enrollment periods for fall and spring semesters and winter and summer sessions.

howToGetIt: Follow Online instructions via this TOOL
cost: This is a fee based service.
agency: ASSOCIATED STUDENTS, INC. OF S.F. STATE UNIVERSITY
